title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Heat, NFL offense, NBA bubble
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Heat, NFL offense, NBA bubble
description:
The Miami Heat have done a great job devolving home grown talent

Offense in the NFL is evolving fast

Young players are playing well in the NBA bubble

Being close to greatness won't necessarily make you great as well


Guest: Ryen Russillo

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
